resources.string: You can see your daily bonus targets and progress under the Today section on the \'My Earnings\' page.
The amount of points you\'ll earn depends on the size of the parcels.
The amount you\'ll receive for delivering a parcel depends on the size of the parcel.\n1. Marketplace: Lazada, Tiktok, Shopee, Tokopedia, Bukalapak, Blibli\n2. Non-MP: Soscom, KPP, BPJS, Bank, Mitra
The amount you’ll receive for delivering a parcel depends on the size of the parcel, who is sending the parcel and in what region you’re delivering it.

For each successful parcel you\'ll earn bonus points. To earn your daily bonus you have to reach certain points.\n1• 120 points = get total bonus of Rp15,000\n1• 300 points = get total bonus of Rp30,000
To earn your monthly bonus you have to deliver a minimum number of parcels while also maintain a high success rate of your deliveries.
You will not be eligible for a bonus in a month, if there are any customer complaints or signs of fraudulent behaviour.
